title: Choujigen Kakumei Anime: Dimension High School
original_name: 超次元革命アニメ Dimension ハイスクール
opening_song: "Here we go!" by 4 Dimensions [Junpei Shiroyama (ACT: Takahide Ishii), Ryuusei Midorigaoka (ACT: Takeo Ootsuka), Yurio Minakami (ACT: Shouhei Hashimoto), Tsuyoshi Kikawada (ACT: Takuma Zaiki)]
sinopse:
The high school boys transferred to an anime world while they are in cramming school. Since then, they start school life in the anime world they transferred in.

(Source: MAL News)
